title: Poster, The 79th Ginza Graphic Gallery, 1992
signed: Signature imprinted in black, lower right quadrant: Paul Rand
inscribed:
Imprinted in black ink, lower left corner: The 79th Ginza Graphic Gallery Exhibition: Paul Rand/ (text in Japanese that corresponds to English caption)/ November 4-28, 1992 In Cooperation with Tokyo American Center and IBM Japan, Ltd./ (text in Japanese that corresponds to English caption, including, 1992 -28)/ Designed by Paul Rand, Printed in Japan by Dai Nippon Printing Co., Ltd.; imprinted in black ink, lower right corner: g g g/ GINZA GRAPHIC GALLERY/ (text in Japanese that corresponds to next English caption, including, 104 7-7-2 DNP)/ PHONE: 03(3571)5206*/FAX:03(3289)1389/ (text in Japanese) A.M.11:00-P.M.7:00 (text in Japanese, including, P.M.6:00/ (text in Japanese)

* printed in text
description: Across upper three quarters of page, four tipped black squares with colored shapes (clockwise: red, green, purple, and yellow) overlapping on their edges, to form a rooster head.  Small black square in center forms rooster eye.  Lower left corner, imprinted in black ink, in both English and Japanese: title and dates of exhibitionn.  Lower right corner, logo of gallery, in both English and Japanese, name, phone and fax numbers of gallery.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, The 79th Ginza Graphic Gallery, 1992. Offset lithograph on cream paper. 
Gift of Marion S. Rand. 2002-11-1
